knimeNode.name: Date&Time Configuration
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides a date&time configuration option to an encapsulating component's dialog. Outputs a string flow variable with the set value.

intro.p: Outputs a string flow variable with a set date&time value from a component's dialog.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in the dialog
Some lines of description that will be shown for instance in the node description of the component exposing a dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution). This will also be the name of the exported flow variable.
In which granularity the time should be displayed in the wizard.
Which date&time type should be selectable.
The earliest allowed date&time. The execution time can be used.
The latest allowed date&time. The execution time can be used.
The value that is selected by default. The execution time can be used.

ports.outPort: Variable output (string) with the given variable defined.
